metadata.title: CVE-2016-6721 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible
metadata.description: An information disclosure vulnerability in Mediaserver in Android 6.xbefore 2016-11-01 and 7.0 before 2016-11-01 could enable a local maliciousapplication to access data outside of its permission levels. This issue israted as Moderate because it could be used to access sensitive data withoutpermission. Android ID: A-30875060.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
